topic.fullpath: Topic :: Desktop Environment :: K Desktop Environment (KDE)

name: Linobuntu
short_description: My personal favorite is Gnome with KDE applications added to it. I usually spend hours customizing my Ubuntu install etc. The project, Linobuntu aims to bring just that to users. No need to remove all the Gnome software and replace it with KDE.
